title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may need to draw on the opinions of others to solve a daunting problem today. Sometimes, a skillful expert might find it difficult to be wild enough to see fresh possibilities. Trust that a solution can be discovered if you release yourself from the burden of believing you must have all the answers. Otherwise, you could be that person trying to hammer in a nail with a screwdriver handle. Confucian philosopher Xunzi wrote, In order to properly understand the big picture, everyone should fear becoming mentally clouded and obsessed with one small section of truth. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
